snippet: Douglas Kennedy, who faces charges after trying to take his newborn baby outside the hospital for a walk and tussling with nurses, invoked the assassination of his father, Senator Robert F. Kennedy.
abstract: Douglas Kennedy, son of Sen Robert F Kennedy, defends his actions in court after being charged with child endangerment; Kennedy, trying to take his newborn baby from Northern Westchester Hospital's maternity ward for a walk, had tussled with nurses who were enforcing hospital policy.
lead_paragraph: Douglas Kennedy, who faces charges after trying to take his newborn baby outside the hospital for a walk and tussling with nurses, invoked the assassination of his father, Senator Robert F. Kennedy.

headline.seo: Douglas Kennedy Defends Effort to Take Baby From Hospital
headline.main: Kennedy Son Defends Effort to Take Baby From Hospital
headline.print_headline: Kennedy Son Defends Effort To Take Baby From Hospital
